title: Transplanting Tomatoes & Peppers and a Look at the Growing Area

tasks.task: Transplant tomato and pepper plants from trays to individual cups.
subtasks: Label plants with variety names and transplant dates.
Prepare seedling cups with slot openings for drainage.
Create divots in the soil for plant placement.
Use a spoon to carefully dig plants from trays.
Gently remove plants from trays without damaging roots.
Separate closely growing seedlings, prioritizing healthy plants.
Trim excess or weak seedlings for better growth.
Plant seedlings in individual cups, adjusting soil level.
Set up seedlings under LED grow lights for optimal growth.

tasks.task: Prepare and manage a garden setup, including light adjustments.
subtasks: Organize transplanted seedlings on a plant stand.
Monitor and adjust the position of grow lights as needed.
Water transplanted seedlings using a top灌溉方法。
Verify the effectiveness of the growing system through plant health.
